name: SECONDS
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can work all your SECONDS smart devices through Alexa. 

We can’t wait to get started! 

First, enable SECONDS skill in the Alexa app, you will be prompted for a code which can be found in SECONDS app under “Me” tab. 

Next, your devices will start popping up in Alexa app.

Now, jump right in and ask Alexa!

Alexa, turn on my kitchen lights
Alexa, turn off my living lights
Alexa, switch on master aircon
Alexa, set the aircon temperature to 26 degrees
Alexa, switch off all the lights

Are you having fun? 

Next, try to group these devices by rooms or create routines to suit your lifestyle.

Learn about what SECONDS smart devices could help you in home automation and save on utilities. More on our website www.seconds.cc
